messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2184
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/3/02 6:07:28 AM, DMM5692@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/3/02 6:07:28 AM, DMM5692@... writes:

<< why do you people fight? i cant believe i waste my time reading this
crap.....sometimes........ >>

Strong beliefs and the desire to make unschooling easier for people coming to
it now than it was for people who started ten years ago.

Those who can come online and ask a question and get conflicting answers
within a day or an hour will never need to know what it was like to wait two
months for another issue of Growing Without Schooling because you'd already
read the John Holt books twice.

Sandra

Sandra
